CART_INFO: Here is a listing of all the products that you have selected with quantities and prices. Hover your mouse over a product's row to enable quantity adjustments or to discard the product completely. Click on an product's row to view its information page.
LOGIN: In order to provide you with products of the highest quality and at the best prices, we must have an active and engaged membership. As such, you'll need to login to the site to take advantage of Grocery2Go's benefits.
Not a member yet? We'd love to have you sign up!
LOGOUT_MODAL: Are you sure that you want to logout?
OK_CANCEL: Click OK to confirm or Cancel to abort.
ORDER_INFO: Here is a listing of all the products from the order that you selected, along with quantities and prices. If you click on an product's row, you'll be directed to its information page, where you can add it to your shopping basket, again.
PREV_ORDERS: Here is a list of your submitted and fulfilled orders. Click on an order to view its product list and details.
REGISTER: We're thrilled that you've decided to create an account! Just give us a little info about yourself and you'll be all ready to load up a shopping basket.

All fields are mandatory so make sure your form is complete. Make sure that your password has at least 10 characters with a lowercase and uppercase character, a digit and a special character (e.g., !@#$%).
SUBMISSION_FORM: Please confirm your existing user information or update it by clicking on the link below it if needed. Then tell us where you'd like the order sent. We'll email you with status updates as necessary.
SUBMIT_MODAL: Are you sure that you want to submit this order?
